archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Service Order decomposition
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation:
The Service Order Decomposition function decomposes the service orders, into sub-sequent service orders and resource order requests, and then distributes each request to perform the work. This function also translates planned design changes into implementation jobs (which could include service ordering and/or delivery) that may span multiple resource facing services and technology domains. This might require additional data gathered via Service Data Collection.
Note: If an order repository or common order data services (common model) layer is being used and shared across layers (Customer, Service, and Resource layers), this decomposition can simplified
